author: Kaelan Deese
title: Coronavirus can travel up to 13 feet: study
description: Further studies of air samples in hospitals wards treating COVID-19 patients uncovered that the virus could travel up to 13 feet, more than twice the distance current social distancing g...
content:
Further studies of air samples in hospitals wards treating COVID-19 patients uncovered that the virus could travel up to 13 feet, more than twice the distance current social distancing guidelines mandate.
The investigation was conducted by Chinese researcher… [+2404 chars]
